compatibility.title: MBTI Compatibility
compatibility.subtitle: Check compatibility between types and learn relationship tips
compatibility.defaultDescription: Your different personalities create a balanced relationship.
compatibility.defaultAdvice: Respect your differences and learn from each other as you grow together.

level90.title: 90-100 points
level90.name: Soulmates
level90.desc: Personalities are very well matched. An ideal relationship where you understand and complement each other.

level80.title: 80-89 points
level80.name: Great Match
level80.desc: You get along well and can grow together.

level70.title: 70-79 points
level70.name: Good Relationship
level70.desc: There are differences, but with effort, you can maintain a good relationship.

levelBelow70.title: Below 70 points
levelBelow70.name: Needs Effort
levelBelow70.desc: There are many differences. Understanding and respecting each other is important.

tips: Understand how your partner expresses love (words vs actions)
When conflicts arise, acknowledge differences and find compromise
Develop common interests and find activities you can enjoy together
Consider each other's strengths when dividing household roles
Adapt to differences in communication styles
Regularly share your feelings and thoughts with each other
Choose education methods considering your child's MBTI
Support their growth through encouragement rather than pressure
Find learning styles that match your child's personality type

intjEnfp.title: Architect × Campaigner
intjEnfp.desc: Perfect combination of strategic thinking (INTJ) and creative energy (ENFP). Maximizes each other's strengths.

istjEsfp.title: Logistician × Entertainer
istjEsfp.desc: Balance of stability (ISTJ) and energy (ESFP). Complements each other's weaknesses.

infjEnfp.title: Advocate × Campaigner
infjEnfp.desc: Harmony of deep empathy and idealism. Understands and supports each other's emotions well.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How accurate is the MBTI test?
faq.answer1: The MBTI test is a personality type analysis tool based on statistical probabilities. It is not an absolute diagnostic tool, and behavior may vary depending on the situation. Please use it for reference purposes.
faq.question2: Can I save my test results?
faq.answer2: Currently, you can view your test results temporarily. When you sign up for membership, you will be able to save your results. More features will be added in future updates.
faq.answer3: Yes, MBTI types can change with growth and environmental changes. We recommend taking the test regularly to track your changes.
faq.answer4: Our service is intended as a reference tool. If you need professional psychological counseling, we recommend consulting with a qualified professional.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Simple MBTI's policy on personal information processing

article1.title: Article 1 (Purpose)
article1.content: Simple MBTI (hereinafter referred to as the "Service") values users' personal information and complies with relevant laws such as the 「Personal Information Protection Act」. This Privacy Policy informs you of how and for what purposes your personal information is used, and what measures are taken to protect your personal information.

article2.title: Article 2 (Personal Information Collected)
article2.content: The Service collects the following personal information for membership registration and service usage.

article3.title: Article 3 (Purpose of Personal Information Collection and Use)
article3.content: The collected personal information is used for the following purposes.
items: MBTI test result storage and retrieval

article4.title: Article 4 (Retention and Use Period of Personal Information)
article4.content: Users' personal information is, in principle, promptly deleted upon achievement of the purpose of collection and use. However, if retention is required under relevant regulations, it will be retained for the period specified by law.

article5.title: Article 5 (Procedures and Methods of Personal Information Destruction)
article5.content: The Service, in principle, promptly deletes information once the purpose of personal information collection and use has been achieved.
items: Personal information stored in electronic files is deleted using technical methods that make reproduction impossible
Personal information recorded on paper documents is destroyed by shredding or incineration

article6.title: Article 6 (User Rights and How to Exercise Them)
article6.content: Users can view, modify, or request deletion of their registered personal information at any time.
items: View/Modify personal information: Profile in settings menu
Delete personal information: Contact customer center
Withdraw consent: Personal information in settings menu

article7.title: Article 7 (Measures to Ensure Safety of Personal Information)
article7.content: The Service takes the following measures to safely manage users' personal information.
items: Encryption: Personal information is encrypted for storage and transmission
Access restriction: Minimize access to personal information
Security programs: Install and operate latest security programs
Regular audits: Regularly inspect personal information handling status

article8.title: Article 8 (Changes to Privacy Policy)
article8.content: This Privacy Policy may be changed according to laws and policies, and when changes are made, users will be notified at least 7 days in advance through announcements on the service.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.subtitle: Terms and conditions for using Simple MBTI service
termsOfService.article1Content: These Terms of Service are established to stipulate the terms and conditions of service usage, rights and obligations between users and the service provider, responsibilities, and other necessary matters regarding all services provided by Simple MBTI (hereinafter referred to as the "Service").
termsOfService.article2Def1: refers to all online services provided by Simple MBTI.
termsOfService.article2Def2: refers to all users who access the Service and use it in accordance with these Terms of Service.
termsOfService.article2Def3: refers to the personality type test provided by the Service.
termsOfService.article2Def4: refers to the personality type analysis result provided after the MBTI test.
termsOfService.article3Intro: These Terms of Service become effective for all users who wish to use the Service.
termsOfService.article3Point1: The Service may change these Terms of Service within the scope not violating relevant laws when necessary.
termsOfService.article3Point2: When changing the terms, users will be notified at least 7 days in advance through announcements on the Service.
termsOfService.article3Point3: If a user does not agree to the modified terms, they may discontinue using the Service.
termsOfService.article4Intro: The Service provides the following services:
termsOfService.article5Intro: Service usage may be restricted in the following cases:
termsOfService.article5Reason1: Infringement of others' rights or illegal activities
termsOfService.article5Reason2: Interference with the normal operation of the Service
termsOfService.article5Reason3: Submission of false information or misuse of others' information
termsOfService.article5Reason4: Violation of these Terms of Service
termsOfService.article6Intro: MBTI test results are for reference only and have the following limitations:
termsOfService.article6Limit1: It is not an absolute diagnostic tool.
termsOfService.article6Limit2: Behavior may vary depending on the situation.
termsOfService.article6Limit3: It does not replace professional psychological counseling.
termsOfService.article6Limit4: Results are based on statistical probability.
termsOfService.article7Intro: The Service is not responsible for the following:
termsOfService.article7Disclaimer1: User decisions and actions based on test results
termsOfService.article7Disclaimer2: Mental or material damages arising from Service usage
termsOfService.article7Disclaimer3: Force majeure such as natural disasters, system failures, etc.
termsOfService.article7Disclaimer4: Damages caused by illegal acts of third parties
termsOfService.article8Content: All intellectual property rights for the Service's content, design, software, etc. belong to the Service. Users may not reproduce, distribute, or transmit these without prior written consent from the Service.
termsOfService.article9Content: Disputes related to these Terms of Service shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of Korea, and the competent court shall be the court having jurisdiction over the location of the Service provider's headquarters.

about.metadataTitle: About Us - MBTI Personality Type Test | Expert-Validated Content
about.metadataDescription: Introduction to the MBTI test site, methodology, and expert information. Providing reliable personality type analysis based on psychological research and data.
about.ogTitle: About Us - MBTI Personality Type Test
about.ogDescription: Reliable MBTI analysis based on psychological research and data.
about.heroSubtitle: Professional and reliable MBTI analysis based on psychological research and data
about.missionDescription: This site was created to help people better understand their own and others' personality types through the MBTI (Myers-Briggs Type Indicator) personality test, and to aid in relationship improvement and personal growth. We provide accurate and reliable information based on scientific evidence and research data to help people discover their potential and live better lives.
about.expert1Edu: Ph.D. in Psychology, Seoul National University
about.expert1Work: Former Senior Researcher, Samsung HR Research Institute
about.expert1Quote: MBTI can be a useful tool for self-understanding. Our goal is to provide practical value while recognizing its scientific limitations.
about.expert2Edu: Ph.D. in Education, Yonsei University Graduate School
about.expert2Quote: Self-awareness through MBTI can greatly help personal growth and career development. It's important to understand and respect the strengths of different types.
about.researchBaseDesc: Our content is based on authoritative research and academic sources:
about.standardizedQuestionsDesc: Reliability ensured through validated MBTI items
about.balancedPlacementDesc: Randomized question order to minimize bias
about.scoreWeightDesc: Statistical weighting applied to each response
about.partnershipsDesc: We collaborate with the following organizations to maintain academic accuracy:
about.org3: Korean Society for Industrial and Organizational Psychology
about.org4: Korean Association for Human Resource Management
about.limitation1: MBTI is a tool for understanding preferences, not a scientific diagnostic tool.
about.limitation2: Results are for reference and do not fully describe all characteristics of an individual.
about.limitation3: It should not be used as the sole criterion for employment or important decisions.
about.limitation4: Personal information is encrypted and stored, and not shared with third parties.
about.limitation5: All content is for informational purposes and cannot replace professional counseling.
about.contactDesc: Feel free to contact us if you have any questions about the test or site, partnership proposals, or academic feedback.

usage.title: Practical Applications
usage.subtitle: Learn how to effectively use MBTI in your daily life, career, and relationships
usage.stressManagementDesc: Learn effective stress relief methods for each personality type
usage.timeManagementDesc: Apply time management methods suited to your type
usage.decisionMakingDesc: Use decision-making methods that leverage each type's strengths
usage.understandLoveLanguage: Understand how your partner expresses love (words vs actions)
usage.acceptDifferences: Accept differences and find compromise during conflicts
usage.commonInterests: Develop common interests and find activities to enjoy together
usage.roleDistribution: Consider each other's strengths when dividing household roles
usage.adaptCommunication: Adapt to differences in communication styles
usage.regularSharing: Regularly share feelings and thoughts with each other
usage.mbtiBasedEducation: Choose education methods based on your child's MBTI
usage.encouragement: Support growth through encouragement rather than coercion
usage.learningStyle: Find learning styles that match your child's personality type
usage.warningContent: MBTI is just a reference tool and does not perfectly describe your personality. Behavior can vary depending on the situation. If you need professional counseling, please seek help from a qualified expert.

glossary.title: Glossary
glossary.subtitle: Easily understand MBTI terms and concepts

beginner.title: For Beginners
tips: Start with the basic concepts of the four dichotomies
Accurately identify your own type
Read the type characteristics repeatedly
Analyze the types of people close to you
Don't treat MBTI results as absolute truth

advanced.title: Advanced Study
tips: Study the concept of cognitive functions in depth
Understand the function stack of each type
Observe behavior patterns under stress
Interact with people of various types
Learn about MBTI limitations and misconceptions

practical.title: Practical Application
tips: Consider the other person's type when communicating
Apply type-specific coping methods in conflicts
Utilize your strengths in career choices
Respect each other's differences in relationships
Practice continuous self-reflection

warning.title: Cautions
tips: MBTI is not a scientific diagnostic tool
Don't categorize people simply as labels
Types can change with growth and circumstances
It cannot replace professional counseling
Continuous learning and flexible thinking are important

usage.title: Practical Usage
usage.description: Career, dating, and daily life applications
